EmailTemplate.subject: White Paper: Strategies for Building the Digital First Branch
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Consumers are adopting digital technology faster than ever. Ordering lunch on a smartwatch. Calling friends via Siri on earbuds. Shopping over chatbot. Most FIs are early in their digital first journey and struggle to enable the flexibility they need to offer similarly connected, seamless and on-demand experiences. According to the Financial Brand, only 15% classified themselves as digital leaders pre-pandemic. So what can FIs do to make meaningful progress and accelerate their digital strategy?
